author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
Due to reported issues with how `:` is misinterpreted as a file path, need to revert change to put PSNativePSPathResolution back as Experimental.

Related https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/13644
Related https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/13640

Reverts PowerShell/PowerShell#13522

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body:
:tada:`v7.1.0-rc.2` has been released which incorporates this pull request.:tada:

Handy links:
* [Release Notes](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/tag/v7.1.0-rc.2)

title: Revert "Change `PSNativePSPathResolution` to not be Experimental"
